dc_creator_sm: University of Michigan. China Data Center.
Beijing Hua tong ren shi chang xin xi you xian ze ren gong si
dc_description_s: REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. Hebei Main Rivers, 2000 is a polygon theme representing major rivers in Hebei in 2000. It also includes some lake, dam, and reservoir features. This data layer is part of the China 2000 Township Census data set produced by the All China Marketing Research Co. and distributed by the University of Michigan, China Data Center.
